para.text: PHAST uses a point-distributed grid. The nodes in this grid are at the corners of elements (fig. 1). Each node is surrounded by a cell that includes parts of one to eight elements (fig. 1). Boundary and initial conditions are specified by node; aquifer properties are specified by element.
